column3: No, sir, only the housekeeper. He's been in New England visiting his daughter. He always goes there in the fall. He was due back at the Heathrow on BA flight 214 arriving at seven twenty-five.

He tried one more time at 7:25, and nothing had changed. It ran and ran, eleven, twelve, thirteen times.
He threw his guitar in his dadâ€™s car and drove south toward Prescott. The Built to Spill tape was still in the tape deck, and he just let it keep going; it might as well be the damn soundtrack to everything.
He picked up his hat and coat and Clarice said hello to him and he said hello and looked at the clock and it was almost twenty-five after seven.
